meanings.definition: A small, round or oval-shaped piece of meat or fish, often used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared delicious medaillons for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I grilled some medaillons for our barbecue last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The medaillons in the stew were so tasty, they disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was adorned with medaillons that shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling sound of the medaillons cooking on the pan made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A decorative or commemorative round or oval-shaped object, often made of metal.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient medaillons from different civilizations.
meanings.sent2: She received a medaillon as a token of appreciation for her hard work.
meanings.sent3: The medaillon on his keychain brought him good luck wherever he went.
meanings.sent4: The medaillon gleamed in the candlelight, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The medaillon was engraved with intricate designs, showcasing fine craftsmanship.
